00061 inline void modules::options::SetOption(const std::string& name, const std::string& option){
00062     std::pair<OptionsList_t::iterator, bool> ret = fOptions.insert(make_pair(name,option));
00063     // if a new key was added, store an iterator in the order list
00064     if(ret.second) fOrder.push_back(ret.first);
00065 }
00066 
00067 inline bool modules::options::HasOption(const std::string& name)const{
00068     return fOptions.find(name)!=fOptions.end();
00069 }
